visaPage.title: Visa & Entry
visaPage.subtitle: Overview
visaPage.disclaimer: Informational guidance only. Not legal advice.

download.title: Complete Visa Checklist
download.description: Download a comprehensive, printable checklist for your visa application.

requirements.application: Completed visa application form (signed and dated)
requirements.photos: 2 recent passport photos (35x45mm, color, white background)
requirements.flight: Roundtrip flight reservation or travel itinerary
requirements.accommodation: Proof of accommodation (hotel bookings, invitation letter)
requirements.financial: Financial means evidence (bank statements, employment letter)
requirements.invitation: Official invitation letter from Romanian cultural institution/event organizer
requirements.achievements: Proof of previous cultural/professional achievements (portfolio, CV)
requirements.employment: Letter from employer (if employed) or university enrollment certificate (if student)
requirements.biometricMay: Biometric data may be requested at application
requirements.security: Additional security clearance may be required
requirements.yellowFeverMay: Yellow fever vaccination certificate may be required

shortStay.purpose: Tourism, business visits, family, cultural events

checklist.title: Common Short-stay (C) Checklist
checklist.noVisaRequired: No visa required for short stays — check official guidance for entry requirements.

note.title: Important Note
note.description: Requirements may vary by nationality and specific circumstances. Always consult the official Romanian consulate or embassy in your country for the most current and specific requirements.

noVisa.title: No Visa Required
noVisa.description: Citizens of {country} can enter Romania visa-free for tourist or business stays up to 90 days within any 180-day period.

egypt.confirmedDescription: Based on actual visa applications processed in June 2025. Type C visa valid for 7-8 days cultural visits.

requirements.item1: Passport scan (valid 6+ months beyond intended stay)
requirements.item2: EU visa application form (filled automatically after completing online form on Romanian Embassy eVisa portal in Cairo)
requirements.item4: Proof of 2-way go and return ticket (roundtrip flight reservation)
requirements.item5: Travel insurance (minimum €30,000 coverage for Schengen area)
requirements.item6: Proof of accommodation (hotel bookings, invitation letter, or host arrangements)
requirements.item7: Bank account statement (or of parent/guardian if student) - last 3-6 months
requirements.item8: University registration certificate (if student) OR employment letter (if employed)
requirements.item10: Letter of invitation and reimbursement (if available) for cultural visits
requirements.item11: Movements certificate of your last 7 years in and out of your country (required if haven't had Schengen visa before)
requirements.item12: Purpose of visit documentation (cultural activities, business meetings, tourism)

requirementsList: Passport scan (valid 6+ months beyond intended stay)
EU visa application form (filled automatically after completing online form on Romanian Embassy eVisa portal in Cairo)
Proof of 2-way go and return ticket (roundtrip flight reservation)
Travel insurance (minimum €30,000 coverage for Schengen area)
Proof of accommodation (hotel bookings, invitation letter, or host arrangements)
Bank account statement (or of parent/guardian if student) - last 3-6 months
University registration certificate (if student) OR employment letter (if employed)
Letter of invitation and reimbursement (if available) for cultural visits
Movements certificate of your last 7 years in and out of your country (required if haven't had Schengen visa before)
Purpose of visit documentation (cultural activities, business meetings, tourism)

importantList.li1: Criminal record certificate NOT required for short stays (7-8 days)
importantList.li2: Movements certificate only needed if you haven't had a Schengen visa before
importantList.li3: Students can use parent/guardian bank statements
importantList.li4: Cultural visit letters can include reimbursement details if applicable

consulate.title: Romanian Embassy in Cairo
consulate.submitText: For Egyptian citizens, submit your application at:
consulate.linkText: Romanian Embassy in Cairo - eVisa Portal

items.romanianMFA: Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs - Visa Information

footerCTA.title: Ready for Your Next Step?
footerCTA.description: Once your visa is approved, explore work opportunities, study programs, and cultural experiences waiting for you in Romania.

travelPage.description: Curated itineraries to inspire short trips and deeper stays across Romania's diverse regions.

essentials.title: Travel Essentials
essentials.languageDesc: Romanian (official), English widely spoken in cities
essentials.connectivityDesc: Excellent 4G/5G, Free WiFi in most venues

byTrain.title: By Train
byTrain.desc: Extensive network connecting major cities. Book at CFR Călători.

byBus.title: By Bus
byBus.desc: FlixBus and local operators serve all regions. Comfortable and affordable.

byCar.title: Car Rental
byCar.desc: International licenses accepted. Great for exploring Transylvania.

travelPage.stopPlaceholder: Details and tips for this stop will be added soon.

tips.title: Local Tips
tips.bestTimeDesc: Spring (May-June) and early autumn (September) offer pleasant weather and fewer crowds.
tips.packDesc: Comfortable walking shoes, camera, and layers for changing weather in the mountains.

studyPage.description: Comprehensive guide to Romanian universities, degree programs, and academic pathways for international students.

noResults.title: No universities found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your filters to see more results.

tuition.title: Tuition & Costs
tuition.desc: Public universities: €1,800-5,500/year. Living costs: €300-600/month depending on city.

language.title: Language Requirements
language.desc: Romanian or English programs available. IELTS/TOEFL required for English programs.

visa.title: Student Visa
visa.desc: Long-stay visa (D) required for studies. Apply 3 months before start date.

housing.title: Student Housing
housing.desc: University dorms available. Private housing: €150-400/month depending on location.

undergraduate.title: Undergraduate
undergraduate.desc: Bachelor's degree programs across diverse fields with strong academic foundation.

graduate.title: Graduate
graduate.desc: Master's programs for specialization and advanced knowledge in your field.

doctorate.title: Doctorate
doctorate.desc: PhD programs for research and academic careers with international recognition.

businessPage.title: Business & Investment
businessPage.subtitle: Romania
businessPage.description: Comprehensive guide to starting a business, investment opportunities, and entrepreneurship in Romania with step-by-step processes.

hero.title: Start Your Business in Romania
hero.description: Romania offers a strategic location, EU market access, competitive costs, and growing tech ecosystem. From SRL registration to investment incentives — everything you need to launch successfully.

types.title: Business Structure Options
types.description: Choose the right legal structure for your business goals and investment capacity.

srl.title: SRL (Limited Liability Company)
srl.description: Most popular choice for SMEs and startups

sa.title: SA (Joint Stock Company)
sa.description: For larger enterprises and public companies

steps.title: 5-Step Business Setup Process
steps.description: Streamlined registration process designed for efficiency and transparency.

step1.title: Company Name Reservation
step1.description: Reserve your company name through ONRC (National Trade Register Office). Check availability and reserve for 30 days.

step2.title: Prepare Documentation
step2.description: Prepare articles of incorporation, shareholder agreements, and required legal documents with a notary.

step3.title: Open Bank Account
step3.description: Deposit minimum share capital in a Romanian bank and obtain certificate of deposit for registration.

step4.title: Register with ONRC
step4.description: Submit all documents to the National Trade Register Office for official company registration and tax ID.

step5.title: Tax & Social Registration
step5.description: Register for VAT (if applicable), social security, and other regulatory requirements with ANAF.

investment.title: Investment Opportunities
investment.description: Romania offers attractive incentives across key growth sectors with EU market access.

tech.title: Technology & IT
tech.description: Thriving tech ecosystem with skilled workforce and government support
tech.incentives: R&D tax credits, IT exemptions, EU funding access

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing & Industry
manufacturing.description: Strategic location with access to European supply chains
manufacturing.incentives: Investment grants, regional aid, infrastructure support

energy.title: Renewable Energy
energy.description: Growing focus on green energy and sustainability projects
energy.incentives: Green certificates, EU climate funds, tax benefits

agriculture.title: Agriculture & Food
agriculture.description: Rich agricultural land and growing food processing sector
agriculture.incentives: CAP funding, rural development grants, export support

essentials.title: Business Essentials
essentials.description: Key information every entrepreneur needs to know about doing business in Romania.

registration.title: Company Registration
registration.description: ONRC handles all business registrations with online and in-person options available.

taxes.title: Tax & Compliance
taxes.description: 16% corporate tax rate, VAT registration, and monthly/quarterly reporting requirements.

banking.title: Business Banking
banking.description: Romanian and international banks offer business accounts with EU payment integration.

euAccess.title: EU Market Access
euAccess.description: Full access to European Single Market with freedom of movement for goods and services.

resources.title: Official Resources & Support
resources.description: Connect with official government agencies and investment promotion organizations.

onrc.title: ONRC - Trade Register
onrc.description: National Trade Register Office for all company registrations and official business records.

anaf.title: ANAF - Tax Authority
anaf.description: National Agency for Fiscal Administration for tax registration, compliance, and reporting.

investRomania.title: InvestRomania
investRomania.description: Official investment promotion agency providing support for foreign investors and businesses.
